pages.text: Kitchen Stoves can be used to heat cooking utensils.
Kitchen Stoves would stop working after being idle for a while.
Mud-and-drystone stoves are cheap, but they produce heat twice slower then other stove varieties, on par with $(l:worldgen/volcanic_fumarole)fumarole vents$(/l).
There're also stoves of $(l:intro/kitchen_materials)other materials$(/l), which are faster but consume more fuel.
